name: Kingdom's Flame
description:
Story:

Long ago the four houses of the isle of fire each had a sacred flame that they used to repel the evil water spirits. However hundreds of years ago 3 of the 4 eternal flames went out for a reason lost to history. Now only one remains. The water spirit menace remained dormant all those years but now it rises again threatening the four houses of the isle of fire. You young firebearer must use the power of the sacred flame to unify all four houses in harmony and protect the isle forever.

How To Play (Important there is no tutorial in game):

You die if any of your towers lose all their health or if the flame-bearer (red trapezoid with the flame staff) is a attacked by a water spirit (blue circles). You can see the health of the four towers on the right. Look at the minimap to see their locations as well as your's and all enemies. To win spend 3 minutes in each tower. You can see your total time at the top. To enter a tower walk your flame bearer into it. Towers have archers to defend themselves. These archers are much stronger while you are in the tower. When in a tower you generate money for that tower. This can be spent to buy up to 2 more archers or to heal the tower. Note: there is no natural regeneration for anything. Exit a tower by pressing exit in the top left. While in a tower press "Edit Patrol Layout" to place archers swordsman shields and chests to defend your flame-bearer. To place a unit click its picture on the left and then click a location in the 9 by 9 grid. To delete a unit press delete on the right and then click a unit.  You can see their stats on the right. The entire patrol moves at the speed of the slowest unit. When you are done press exit in the top right. The chests can store up to 500 gold each. You can use this to transfer gold between towers. Add gold to these chests or take it out by pressing "Increase" or "Decrease" in the top left. Finally you have three teleports you can use to instantly teleport to any of the towers. Click the tower on the minimap to teleport to it.

Water Spirit Stats:

  • Normal: 5 health, 3 attack, 26 speed
  • Tank: 12 health, 5 attack, 26 speed
  • Attacker: 5 health,  8 attack, 26 speed
